sentences.english: Suzhou Jin Long Optical Instrument Factory was built in 1998 in Suzhou.
sentences.chinese: 蘇州市金龍光學儀器廠於1998年建於蘇州。

sentences.english: The sturdily constructed instrument optically measure specific gravity of aqueous solutions.
sentences.chinese: 堅固結構光學儀器用於測量水溶液的比重。

sentences.english: we have booked your order no 267 for optical instruments.
sentences.chinese: 我們接受你方有關光學儀器的第267號訂單。

sentences.english: Telescopes and microscopes are optical instruments.
sentences.chinese: 望遠鏡和顯微鏡都是光學儀器。

sentences.english: Mirrors and eye -glasses are simple optical instruments which you know about.
sentences.chinese: 鏡子和眼鏡是大家都知道的簡單光學儀器。

sentences.english: He received a B. S. in Optical Engineering from Zhejiang University in 1990.
sentences.chinese: 1990年畢業於浙江大學光學儀器工程學系。

sentences.english: Microscopes and telescopes are optical instruments.
sentences.chinese: 望遠鏡和顯微鏡是光學儀器。

sentences.english: Suzhou Jinlong Optics Instrument Factory was established in 2000 in Suzhou, China.
sentences.chinese: 蘇州市金龍光學儀器廠在2000年成立於蘇州。

sentences.english: Objective To analyze the marks on the concave surface key.
sentences.chinese: 目的運用光學儀器研究內凹齒鑰匙痕跡形態特徵。
